input.sentences: this family decided to go on a ski trip .
these two sister decided to take out on their own and look to be having lots of fun .
she fell as she was trying to ski down the cliff .
this group here decided to to have some fun together learning how to ski .
this one decided to go out on his own .
output.sentences: It was their first ski trip together.
They gathered outside the wildlife refuge.
Little Jimmy was having trouble with his snow shoes.
But everyone got the hang of it as they went.
They hiked and skied all day.
